data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pyron, Alexander, Burbrink, Frank T. (2009): Systematics of the Common Kingsnake (Lampropeltis getula, Serpentes: Colubridae) and the burden of heritage in taxonomy. Zootaxa 2241: 22-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190597
